mil7.4.8:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘suriyassa satta angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani satta angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.8:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbakilesa anavasesam parisosetabba.
mil7.4.8:1.4: Idam, maharaja, suriyassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.8:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, suriyo tamandhakaram vidhamati;
mil7.4.8:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbam ragatamam dosatamam mohatamam manatamam ditthitamam kilesatamam sabbam duccaritatamam vidhamayitabbam.
mil7.4.8:2.3: Idam, maharaja, suriyassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.8:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, suriyo abhikkhanam carati;
mil7.4.8:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena abhikkhanam yoniso manasikaro katabbo.
mil7.4.8:3.3: Idam, maharaja, suriyassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.8:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena arammanamalina bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.8:4.3: Idam, maharaja, suriyassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.8:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, suriyo mahajanakayam santapento carati;
mil7.4.8:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena acarasilagunavattappatipattiya jhanavimokkhasamadhisamapattiindriyabalabojjhangasatipatthanasammappadhanaiddhipadehi sadevako loko santapayitabbo.
mil7.4.8:5.3: Idam, maharaja, suriyassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.8:6.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, suriyo rahubhaya bhito carati;
mil7.4.8:6.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena duccaritaduggativisamakantaravipakavinipatakilesajalajatite ditthisanghatapatimukke kupathapakkhande kummaggapatipanne satte disva mahata samvegabhayena manasam samvejetabbam.
mil7.4.8:6.3: Idam, maharaja, suriyassa chattham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.8:7.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, suriyo kalyanapapake dasseti;
mil7.4.8:7.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena indriyabalabojjhangasatipatthanasammappadhanaiddhipadalokiyalokuttaradhamma dassetabba.
mil7.4.8:7.3: Idam, maharaja, suriyassa sattamam angam gahetabbam.
